description: "On this map of Asia, borders are outlined and cities underlined in different colours to show the colonial territories of the European powers: e.g. at this time, Benkulen (Bencoolen) on the west coast of Sumatra is British, and Malacca is Dutch."
title: "Asien nach den neusten und besten Hülfsmitteln entworffen und herausgegeben im Jahre 1793"
